countriesNotInParis: Some of the involved countries have not joined the Paris Agreement
beneficiaryUpdatedNDC: All the involved countries have joined the Paris Agreement, but just the main beneficiary has updated its Nationally Determined Contribution (NDC) since 2015
mainBeneficiaryNDCAligned: All the involved countries have joined the Paris Agreement, but just the main beneficiary has its NDC aligned with the project sector’s
allUpdatedNotAligned: All the involved countries have joined the Paris Agreement, all have updated its NDC since 2015, but not all have its NDC aligned with the project sector’s
allUpdatedAllAligned: All the involved countries have joined the Paris Agreement, all have updated its NDC since 2015, and all have its NDC aligned with the project sector’s
